title: Riot did some progress on Honor but forgot about those inten feed and afk
body: Have Riot forgot about those players who deserve to be punish after their intentional feeding and afkers, like seriously, Riot trying to improve your game but letting those "players" having fun on their own and destroying other people's game. I am not a high elo player, I am not good enough to 1v9 like this, so please Riot, make your game much more fair, I've been playing league since season5, until now I don't see there are improve on the punishment.

replies.body:
I actually think things are a lot better than they were. Lobby fights are all but gone with the assigned roles (you get the odd dipshit here and there but the chaos rage of norms lobby is gone from ranked). 10 bans means everyone can ban one they want banned and that is also reducing aggro.

There is still some salt but the number of intentional feeders is definitely down from what I remember but that could also be an ELO thing as bronze is horrendous for this (I'm only silver but the difference is noticeable).

All in all I think riot are doing good things with player behaviour. You're always gonna get the odd dipshit here or there but these are the exceptions and not the rule.

key thing is not to be the dipshit.

Well i am super unlucky then when i am still getting rage quit and inten feed ever since i posted. 
10 bans is good when everyone can ban a champ but this is not the problem (well even my team counter pick enemy and still lose like shiit), i don't see there are improvement about the behavior from players, it is odd after every game and show up who am I going to honor. 
I am silver too and I do know there are still lots of thing that I can improve, I climb from b5 and S3 is thats all i can climb up with the trolls in my team. I can climb up to high gold in Taiwan's server why I can't do it in OCE, coz player in there know what they are doing and what have to be done by time passing, but in OCE they don't ( not getting the role that they wanted so they troll, feed, rage), and no concept, no skills ( of course sometimes enemy are the same). 
What i actually want from riot is review reports and games, ban those who are deserve to be ban (player who not even trying). Not just low elo, i know in high elo even challenger there are also have trolls, but like seriously don't ruin somebody rank game, I am happy to lose if my whole team have try because that's mean enemy is better that us for "real".
